areaProps.description: Props passed down to the underlying recharts Area component
areaProps.description_zh: Props passed down to the underlying recharts Area component

color.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color, theme.primaryColor by default
color.description_zh: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color, theme.primaryColor by default

connectNulls.description: Determines whether null values should be connected with other values, true by default
connectNulls.description_zh: Determines whether null values should be connected with other values, true by default

curveType.description: Type of the curve, 'linear' by default
curveType.description_zh: Type of the curve, 'linear' by default

data *.description: Data used to render the chart
data *.description_zh: Data used to render the chart

fillOpacity.description: Controls fill opacity of the area, 0.6 by default
fillOpacity.description_zh: Controls fill opacity of the area, 0.6 by default

trendColors.description: If set, color prop is ignored and chart color is determined by the difference between first and last value.
trendColors.description_zh: If set, color prop is ignored and chart color is determined by the difference between first and last value.

withGradient.description: Determines whether the chart fill should be a gradient, true by default
withGradient.description_zh: Determines whether the chart fill should be a gradient, true by default
